Coffee.name: Pumpkin Cream Cold Brew
Coffee.description: Cold Brew sweetened with vanilla syrup and topped with a pumpkin cream cold foam and a dusting of pumpkin spice topping.

Coffee.name: Salted Caramel Cream Cold Brew
Coffee.description: Cold brew, sweetened with a touch of caramel and topped with a salted, rich cold foam.

Coffee.name: Vanilla Sweet Cream Cold Brew
Coffee.description: Cold Brew coffee accented with vanilla and topped with a delicate float of house-made vanilla sweet cream that cascades throughout the cup.

Coffee.name: Cinnamon Dolce Latte
Coffee.description: Topped with sweetened whipped cream and a cinnamon dolce topping to bring you specialness in a treat.

Coffee.name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
Coffee.description: Combination of pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg and clove. Enjoy it topped with whipped cream and real pumpkin-pie spices.

Coffee.name: Cafe Latte
Coffee.description: Espresso balanced with steamed milk and a light layer of foam.

Coffee.name: Iced Honey Almondmilk Flat White
Coffee.description: Blonde Espresso Roast with a hint of honey.

Coffee.name: Java Chip Coffee Frappuccino
Coffee.description: Chips with coffee, milk and ice, then top it off with whipped cream and a mocha drizzle

Coffee.name: Pumpkin Spice Coffee Frappuccino
Coffee.description: Blended with coffee, milk and ice and topped with whipped cream and pumpkin-pie spice.

Coffee.name: Dark Chocolate Mocha
Coffee.description: Espresso combined with cocoa, ground chocolate and topped with steamed milk.

Coffee.name: White Chocolate Mocha
Coffee.description: white chocolate sauce and steamed milk, and then is finished off with sweetened whipped cream to create this supreme white chocolate delight.

Coffee.name: Pumpkin Spice Creme Frappuccino
Coffee.description: Pumpkin blended with traditional fall spice flavors, milk and ice, topped with whipped cream and pumpkin-pie spice.

Coffee.name: Caramel Macchiato
Coffee.description: Freshly steamed milk with vanilla-flavored syrup marked with espresso and topped with a caramel drizzle for an oh-so-sweet finish.

Coffee.name: Iced Flat White
Coffee.description: Smooth ristretto shots of espresso get the perfect amount of whole milk and ice to create a not-too-strong, not-too-creamy, just-right flavor.

Coffee.name: Matcha Creme Frappuccino
Coffee.description: This blend of sweetened premium matcha green tea, milk and ice—topped off with sweetened whipped cream—inspires a delicious boost and good green vibes.

Coffee.name: Strawberry Creme Frappuccino
Coffee.description: Summer's favorite berry is the star of this delicious Frappuccino® Blended Beverage—a blend of ice, milk and strawberry puree layered on top of a splash of strawberry puree and finished with vanilla whipped cream.

Coffee.name: Chai Creme Frappuccino
Coffee.description: A creamy blend of spicy classic chai, milk and ice. Topped with sweetened whipped cream and a dash of cinnamon. Spice up your afternoon treat.

Coffee.name: White Chocolate Frappuccino
Coffee.description: A smooth blend of white chocolate sauce, milk and ice topped with whipped cream for a remarkable flavor that surprisingly wows.

Coffee.name: Caramel Frappuccino
Coffee.description: Caramel syrup meets coffee, milk and ice for a rendezvous in the blender, while whipped cream and buttery caramel sauce layer the love on top. To change things up, try it affogato-style with a hot espresso shot poured right over the top.

Coffee.name: Apple Crisp Oatmilk Macchiato
Coffee.description: Layered flavors of apple, cinnamon, oats and brown sugar combine in harmony with Starbucks® Blonde Espresso, creamy oatmilk and spiced apple drizzle to create a delicious apple crisp you can sip. A nostalgic autumn pick-me-up.
